text: Unitedworld School of Law commonly known as UWSL is a private law school situated beside Uvarsad-Vavol Road at Gandhinagar in the Indian state of Gujarat. It offers 5 year Integrated law course BBA, LL.B. and 1 year LL.M. course. This institute is affiliated to Karnavati University. Unitedworld School of Law was established by Unitedworld Group of Institutions in 2014. ==References== Category:Law schools in Gujarat Category:Educational institutions established in 2014 Category:2014 establishments in India Category:Education in Gandhinagar
title: Unitedworld School of Law
